requirement_text: Financial institutions must implement risk-based AML/CFT frameworks.
expanded_text: Use risk-based frameworks to prevent money laundering and terrorist financing.

requirement_text: Customer due diligence (CDD) must be performed for all customers.
expanded_text: Verify and check all customers before doing business.

requirement_text: Suspicious transaction reports must be submitted promptly to the authorities.
expanded_text: Report any suspicious transactions quickly to regulators.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must establish robust internal controls to prevent fraud.
expanded_text: Set up strong controls inside the company to stop fraud.

requirement_text: Adequate governance and oversight must be maintained by the board of directors.
expanded_text: The board must oversee risk and compliance properly.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must conduct regular risk assessments.
expanded_text: Regularly identify and evaluate risks to the business.

requirement_text: Data privacy measures must protect customer information.
expanded_text: Protect customer data with privacy safeguards.

requirement_text: Transaction monitoring systems must detect unusual or suspicious activities.
expanded_text: Use systems to watch for suspicious or unusual transactions.

requirement_text: Staff training programs on AML/CFT must be conducted regularly.
expanded_text: Train employees often on AML and counter-terrorism rules.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must maintain audit trails for compliance verification.
expanded_text: Keep records of actions to prove compliance.

requirement_text: Controls to detect and prevent financing of terrorism must be implemented.
expanded_text: Put controls in place to stop terrorist financing.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must screen customers against sanctions lists.
expanded_text: Check customers against government sanctions lists.

requirement_text: Risk-based approach must be applied to new products and services.
expanded_text: Evaluate risks before launching new products or services.

requirement_text: Third-party service providers must comply with MAS regulations.
expanded_text: Make sure vendors follow MAS rules and standards.

requirement_text: Incident response plans must be developed and tested.
expanded_text: Create and test plans to respond to incidents.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must ensure business continuity planning.
expanded_text: Prepare plans to keep business running during disruptions.

requirement_text: Records must be retained for at least five years.
expanded_text: Keep important records for at least five years.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must report cyber incidents to MAS within stipulated timeframes.
expanded_text: Report cyber attacks to MAS on time.

requirement_text: Customer identity verification procedures must comply with MAS standards.
expanded_text: Verify customer identities following MAS rules.

requirement_text: Policies and procedures must be documented and updated regularly.
expanded_text: Write and update policies and procedures regularly.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must implement controls for anti-bribery and corruption.
expanded_text: Put controls in place to prevent bribery and corruption.

requirement_text: Internal audit functions must be independent and effective.
expanded_text: Ensure audits are independent and thorough.

requirement_text: All transactions must be traceable and auditable.
expanded_text: Keep track of all transactions for auditing.

requirement_text: Data encryption must be used for sensitive information.
expanded_text: Encrypt sensitive data to protect it.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must comply with MAS guidelines on outsourcing.
expanded_text: Follow MAS rules when outsourcing services.

requirement_text: Management must regularly review compliance programs.
expanded_text: Management should review compliance programs often.

requirement_text: Financial institutions must report large cash transactions as required.
expanded_text: Report large cash transactions as per regulations.

requirement_text: Compliance officers must be appointed with defined roles.
expanded_text: Assign officers to handle compliance duties.

requirement_text: Policies must address emerging risks including digital assets.
expanded_text: Update policies to cover new risks like digital assets.
tags: emerging risks, digital assets, policy update

requirement_text: Whistleblowing mechanisms must be established and maintained.
expanded_text: Provide ways for staff to report wrongdoing safely.
